note:
"Thieves of Fortress Badabaskor" was my introduction to RPGs. It was new at the time. I'm Olde.

Described by my kids as "painfully straight/cis/middle-aged/middle-class White Dude". They are not, alas, wrong. They're all the colors of the Queer Flag, tho, so I know it comes from a place of Love.

Banner: Computer desk, large monitor, 3d printer, cluttered with things my kids have given/made for me over the years.
Avatar: Headshot, Olde Guye in glasses smiling at the camera
